title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard on Six Legs with Three Drawers, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard on Six Legs with Three Drawers
markings: Stamped  lower right corner: "return to / A.N. Davenport Co. / 96 Washington St. / Boston, Mass."
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower edge, right of center: SIDEBOARD OF MAHOGANY, and below: [numerical notations and more (partly illegible) inscriptions]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Sideboard with front visually divided into three sections by vertical fluted and turned columnar pieces; convex central section contains three drawers, each with two round pulls and a key hole at its center; low backsplash at back of top.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard on Six Legs with Three Drawers, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-4.
